heading.name: Diabetes with HbA1C Testing
heading.definition: % of patients with diabetes aged 40 years and older who have had two or more HbA1C tests within the past 12 months
heading.framework: Based on and adapted from HQO's PCPM: Priority Measures for System and Practice Levels (Oct 2015)
heading.notes: This is a test template for the Diabetes with HbA1C Testing Indicator query

indicatorQuery.query:
SELECT IF ( COUNT(fin.patient) > 0, ROUND( SUM( CASE WHEN fin.a1c > ${ lowerLimit.a1c } THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) * 100 / COUNT(fin.patient) , 1 ), 0) AS "1 or More HbA1c",
-- % WITH 2 or more A1C MEASUREMENTS IF ( COUNT(fin.patient) > 0, ROUND( SUM( CASE WHEN fin.a1c > ${ upperLimit.a1c } THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) * 100 / COUNT(fin.patient) , 1 ), 0) AS "2 or More HbA1c",
-- TOTAL NUMBER OF DM PATIENTS ( ( ROUND( ( COUNT(fin.patient) / COUNT(fin.patient) ),0 ) * 100 ) - ( IF ( COUNT(fin.patient) > 0, ROUND( SUM( CASE WHEN fin.a1c > ${ lowerLimit.a1c } THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) * 100 / COUNT(fin.patient) , 1 ), 0) ) ) AS "No HbA1c"
FROM (
SELECT d.demographic_no AS patient, A1C.a1cnumber AS a1c
FROM demographic d
-- ROOT CONTROLS THE IDENTIFICATION OF ALL DIABETIC PATIENTS. INNER JOIN dxresearch dxr ON ( d.demographic_no = dxr.demographic_no)
-- COUNT ALL A1C MEASUREMENTS. COUNTS ALL TESTS PER PATIENT. LEFT JOIN ( SELECT COUNT(*) AS a1cnumber, demographicNo FROM measurements WHERE type LIKE "A1C" AND DATE(dateObserved) > DATE_SUB( ${ upperLimit.to }, INTERVAL ${ lowerLimit.from } MONTH ) AND demographicNo > 0 GROUP BY demographicNo HAVING COUNT(demographicNo) > -1 ) A1C ON (d.demographic_no = A1C.demographicNo) WHERE d.patient_status LIKE "${ active }" AND dxr.coding_system LIKE "icd9" AND dxr.dxresearch_code IN ${ dxcodelist } AND dxr.status NOT LIKE "%D%" AND d.demographic_no > 0 AND d.provider_no LIKE '${ provider }' AND ( ${lowerLimit.age} <= ROUND( ABS( DATEDIFF( DATE( CONCAT(d.year_of_birth,"-",d.month_of_birth,"-",d.date_of_birth) ), DATE_SUB( ${ upperLimit.to }, INTERVAL ${ lowerLimit.from } MONTH ) ) ) / 365.25 ) ) AND d.demographic_no NOT IN ${excludedPatient} ) fin;
